name: Virtual Stack IT
overview:
Virtual Stack IT provides the managed IT service, Ascend 247, is a scalable, managed IT program that leverages “Fortune 100” level service providers in the IT space to minimize the traditional block hour and break/fix approach. We work to either supplement your existing team or if you prefer, become your single IT resource. Our program provides 95% or better remote resolution rate for infrastructure and help desk support needs in a cost effective service. Ascend 247 is an aggregation model that ensure our clients are getting access to certified IT resources to maintain business continuity while having a single point of contact to provide real time reporting, regular reviews, and recommendations to plan for the future.

We provide 24x7 help desk services, server optimization, back up and on demand services throughout North America.
